about_the_game:
"Into the Backrooms: Last Tape" is an intense horror adventure game developed by Pond Studios, led by Joshua Pond. Immerse yourself in the dark and eerie world of the Backrooms, a surreal and endless labyrinth dimension. In this atmospheric experience, players must uncover the deepest secrets and puzzles of the Backrooms while battling for survival.

With impressive graphics, a captivating soundtrack, and a gripping storyline, "Into the Backrooms: Last Tape" provides an unforgettable gaming experience that delivers both suspense and horror.

At Pond Studios, we take pride in presenting this unique and immersive experience, looking forward to taking players on a journey into a realm beyond imagination. Get ready to dive into "Into the Backrooms: Last Tape" and unveil the secrets lurking in the dark corners of the Backrooms.

content_descriptors.notes: It is a horror game designed to scare the user. Mild violence may occur

detailed_description:
Announcement

Announcement on the Current Development of Into the Backrooms: Last Tape

Dear Community,

We want to inform you that Into the Backrooms: Last Tape is absolutely not finished at this stage. The game is still in a very early phase of development, and many features, as well as content, are yet to be implemented. There is still a lot of work ahead before the game is complete and meets the vision we have in mind.

Rest assured, I’m fully committed to finishing the game and will continue working hard to bring this project to life. Over the coming weeks and months, I will release regular updates to enhance and expand the gameplay experience.

Thank you for your patience and support as we work through this exciting journey!

Best regards,
Joshua Pond


About the Game

With impressive graphics, a captivating soundtrack, and a gripping storyline, "Into the Backrooms: Last Tape" provides an unforgettable gaming experience that delivers both suspense and horror.

At Pond Studios, we take pride in presenting this unique and immersive experience, looking forward to taking players on a journey into a realm beyond imagination. Get ready to dive into "Into the Backrooms: Last Tape" and unveil the secrets lurking in the dark corners of the Backrooms.
legal_notice:
**Legal Lines for Into the Backrooms: Last Tape**

1. **Usage Rights:**
- For personal use and public online presentations only.
- Prohibition on free distribution.

2. **Ownership Rights:**
- All intellectual property rights belong to Pond Studios, specifically Joshua Dean Pond.

3. **Disclaimer of Liability:**
- Neither the developer nor Pond Studios assume liability for damages arising from software use.

4. **Warranty Disclaimer:**
- The software is provided without any warranty.

5. **Updates and Support:**
- Updates and support available through Steam or the official Discord server.

6. **Prohibited Actions:**
- Reverse engineering, decompiling, or unauthorized modifications are strictly prohibited.

7. **Duration of Agreement:**
- This agreement remains valid as long as the game exists.

8. **Geographic Restrictions:**
- No geographic restrictions on software use.

9. **Privacy Policy:**
- No user data is collected.

10. **Applicable Law and Jurisdiction:**
- Subject to German law; disputes resolved in Germany.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 8
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 100 GB available space

short_description: "Into the Backrooms: Last Tape" transports players into a dark and eerie world of the Backrooms. Immerse yourself in an atmospheric horror experience, explore procedurally generated labyrinths, and uncover the secrets lurking in the dark corners.
